casebody.data:
Gary R. HERBERT, Governor of Utah, et al., applicants,
v.
JoNell EVANS, et al. No. 14A65. Supreme Court of the United States July 18, 2014.

Opinion

Application for stay presented to Justice SOTOMAYOR and by her referred to the Court granted. Preliminary injunction issued by the United States District Court for the District of Utah, case No. 2:14-cv-00055-DAK, on May 19, 2014, stayed pending final disposition of the appeal by the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
